name: micro-frontend-comparison

scripts.dev:wujie: pnpm --filter "shared-*" run dev:wujie & pnpm --filter "wujie-*" run dev
scripts.dev:garfish: pnpm --filter "shared-*" run dev:garfish & pnpm --filter "garfish-*" run dev
scripts.build:qiankun: pnpm --filter "shared-*" run build:qiankun && pnpm --filter "qiankun-*" run build
scripts.build:micro-app: pnpm --filter "shared-*" run build:micro-app && pnpm --filter "micro-app-*" run build
scripts.build:wujie: pnpm --filter "shared-*" run build:wujie && pnpm --filter "wujie-*" run build
scripts.build:garfish: pnpm --filter "shared-*" run build:garfish && pnpm --filter "garfish-*" run build
